thread.title_full: Gigi Hadid supports sister Bella Hadid in New York | Daily Mail Online

author: Chelsea White For Dailymail.com
title: supports sister Bella Hadid in New York |
text:
When the going gets tough, families come together.
Gigi Hadid spent the day with sister Bella on Tuesday no doubt trying to keep her younger sibling's mind off her ex.
The two models were spotted heading out in the East Village in New York.
Scroll down for video
Sticking together: Gigi Hadid spent the day with sister Bella in New York on Tuesday no doubt trying to keep her younger sibling's mind off her ex
Step out in style like Bella in Stuart Weitzman £685 Stuart Weitzman Clinger suede boots
Buy them here at MyTheresa
Buy now
It looked pretty chilly in New York City this week as the snow fell, but Bella Hadid had ensured she stayed toasty.
The model rocked a chic faux-fur leopard print coat and a Supreme hoodie underneath, paired with skinny jeans and a pair of Stuart Weitzman ankle boots. This is how to do winter in style.
She topped her look off with a black baseball cap and mirrored aviator sunglasses to give it that undercover celeb edge.
If you want to step out in style this winter, Bella's suede booties are available at MyTheresa - click right to snap them up.
Of course Bella's kicks are pretty pricey though, so if you're hoping to get the sock style bootie for less, check out the cheaper alternatives below.
* PRICES MAY NOT BE AS ADVERTISED ...NOW GET SOME LIKE IT FOR LESS £61 Nasty Gal So Crushed velvet boot
Buy now
£39.99 Public Desire Cayden sock boots at Asos
Buy now
£28.95 Shoe Closet sock pull on high heel ankle boots at SilkFred
Buy now
£330 Dorateymur boots at Farfetch (now £132)
Buy now
While Bella, 20, kept her head down, Gigi dutifully followed behind as they dashed about the city.
Bella is, of course, mending a broken heart after he ex, The Weeknd, not only moved on quickly but did so with Selena Gomez.
The couple, who only linked a few weeks ago, are currently enjoying a romantic trip in Italy.
While Selena may have landed her former man, Bella can take comfort in the fact when it comes to style, she will always come out on top.
Her loves: Gigi expressed that she was missing her two angels, boyfriend Zayn and her pup
Got her back: While Bella, 20, kept her head down, Gigi dutifully followed behind as they dashed about the city
Sibling support: Brother Anwar is also in town and was seen leaving Gigi's apartment that day as well
The model stepped out in a pair of tight black BlankNYC vegan leather pants with mid-calf velvet boots, a black hooded sweater and a statement making leopard print faux fur Majorelle coat which she must have borrowed from her sister's closet.
Her 21-year-old big sister meanwhile strutted out in a pair of straight cut jeans with a distressed metallic knit under a striking black coat.
Gigi accessorized her look with a pair of her own silver boors from her collaboration with Stuart Weitzman, Le Specs LUXE sunglasses and a Versace tote.
Snow day: The star strutted out in a pair of straight cut jeans with a distressed metallic knit under a striking black coat
Added extras: The 21-year-old accessorized her look with a pair of her own silver boors from her collaboration with Stuart Weitzman and a Versace tote
Too cool for school: The style star's layers ensured she looked good but kept warm in the snow
The pair spent the weekend together too, joining protests on Sunday against Donald Trump's executive order restricting immigration which targeted predominately Muslim counties.
The pair were joined by their mother Yolanda at the Battery Park pprotest
The girls' father Mohamed Hadid - who is an acquaintance of Trump - is Muslim and Gigi's boyfriend Zayn Malik is also.
Painful: Bella is, of course, mending a broken heart after he ex, The Weeknd, not only moved on quickly but did so with Selena Gomez. The pair are currently in Italy
Making their voices heard: The models joined protests on Sunday against Donald Trump's executive order restricting immigration which targeted predominately Muslim counties
